com.zentri.zentri_ble_command

Enum GPIODirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GPIODirection>
      • com.zentri.zentri_ble_command.GPIODirection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GPIODirection>

    public enum GPIODirection
extends java.lang.Enum<GPIODirection>
    GPIO direction of a pin configured to the stdio function.
    See Also:
    ZentriOSBLEManager.GPIODirectionSet(int, GPIODirection), ZentriOSBLEManager.GPIOFunctionSet(int, GPIOFunction)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      HIGH_IMPEDANCE
      Configure as floating
      INPUT
      Configure as input with no internal pull-up or pull-down
      INPUT_PULLDOWN
      Configure as input with internal pull-down
      INPUT_PULLUP
      Configure as input with internal pull-up
      OUTPUT_HIGH
      Configure as output with default state high
      OUTPUT_LOW
      Configure as output with default state low
